title: Caastle | Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech in Computer Science
Years of Experience: 0
Prior Experience: Interned at GEP Solutions
Date of the Offer: August 2023
Company: Caastle
Title/Level: Software Dev. I
Location: Bangalore, India
Base Salary: 12,00,000 (Rupees)
Relocation: 0
Signing Bonus: 0
Stock bonus: 10,00,000 Rs
Bonus: Performance-based bonus 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 22,00,000
Benefits: 15 paid vacation days + 10 paid sick leave days + 10 paid  holidays + 2 paid personal days 
Other details: Was given a week to accept or decline the offer.

title: Rippling SDE-2(L6) Bangalore
content:
Education: B.Tech in Electrical Engg. (tier 1)
Years of Experience: 2.8 years
Prior Experience: SDE 1 in a big product based company
Current Base : 20,00,000₹
Current CTC : 28,00,000 ₹
Company: Rippling
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bengaluru, India
Fixed Base: 45,00,000 ₹
Performance Bonus : No variable Pay
Signing Bonus : 5,00,000 ₹
Stocks (ESOPs) : 68K $ over 4 years
Extra benefits- Free office cab and food

Interview Experience - 
There were total 6 rounds.
Round 1 - Problem solving -  Graph based question
Round 2 - Hiring Manager Round - Resume projects discussion
Round 3 & 4 - Coding rounds - Questions like design in memory key val store, excel sheet design
Round 5 & 6 - System Design -  Questions like design Instagram, book my show, uber .

title: Walmart | IN 3 | SE-3 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech IT from tier 3
Years of Experience: 3.6
Prior Experience: Unicorn startup
Salary - 28L Fixed + 33L ESOPS vested over 4 years
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Walmart
Title/Level: IN-3 or SE-3 (this is internal desgination, actual is SDE 2 only as per experience)
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 28.82L Fixed
Signing Bonus: 3L
Relocation Bonus - NA but standard Walmart relocation benefits
Stock bonus: 6.87k granted every year(calculated as a % of your base) 
Bonus: 5.50L Performance Bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~ 36 LPA for 1st year

Other details: HR did not negotiate at all, a very lowball offer but seems like Walmart is lowballing everyone at this point.
Even with the Salesforce offer the HR did not negotiate at all!


Other Offers -

1. [Salesforce](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5070578/Salesforce-or-MTS-2-or-Bangalore)
2. [INDMoney](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5070550/INDMoney-or-SDE-2-or-Gurgaon)
3. Adobe (Accepted)
role: In-3 Or Se-3 (this Is Internal Desgination, Actual Is Sde 2 Only As Per Experience)

title: Salesforce | MTS 2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BTech IT from tier 3
Years of Experience: 3.6
Prior Experience: Unicorn startup
Salary - 28L Fixed + 33L ESOPS vested over 4 years
Date of the Offer: Jan 2024
Company: Salesforce
Title/Level: MTS 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 33.2L fixed
Signing Bonus: 2L
Relocation Bonus - 1.5L
Stock bonus: 70K USD vested over 4 years
Bonus:  3.2L Performance Bonus
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~  54.5 LPA for 1st year (including relocation and joining bonus)

Other details: negotiated once, original proposed offer was with 31 base

**Decision** - Rejected the offer, org was Industries cloud and read upon the reviews saying it is a very toxic culture

Other Offers - 
1. [Walmart](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5070616/Walmart-or-SDE-3-or-Bangalore)
2. [INDMoney](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5070550/INDMoney-or-SDE-2-or-Gurgaon)
3. Adobe (Accepted)
salaryTotal: : ~ 54.5 Lpa For 1st Year (including Relocation And Joining Bonus)
